title: SOLD   Ty Cobb Bat Off Shoulder Pied 350

posts.post_title: SOLD   Ty Cobb Bat Off Shoulder Pied 350
posts.post_content:
It's a solid card and the creases have luckily missed his face.  Sales on eBay have put this in the 700 range with some paperloss and creasing through the face.  I am asking $830 shipped to you or make me an offer.   Trades are also welcome.  Would prefer either large groups of cards or bigger name players.    

PP F&F for payment please.

SOLD
